nodes.text: Jefris was a male Twi'lek who served as a captain in the Republic Army during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. During the early days of the SpecForce Incident, Captain Jefris was sent to find the new commander of Havoc Squad, in order to inform the lieutenant about the vanguard and commando advanced training programs.

Captain Jefris appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the mission giver for the Trooper class's Advanced Class training. He appears on both Coruscant and Carrick Station.
